O

onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) - Method in class com.example.noteation.activities.LocationTaskEditActivity
After sending the user to the setting to manually enable the request, it checks if user enabled the requests threw the settings
onBindViewHolder(CalendarAdapter.CalendarViewHolder, int) - Method in class com.example.noteation.adapters.CalendarAdapter
Initializes one cell from the RecyclerView, it sets the text to the day of the month using the date from the days array (in the position param), if it is equals to today's date, then it highlights it it also sets an "OnClickListener" and checks if it's a month view or week view, if it's a month view then "calendarFragment.onItemClick" function is called, if it's a month view then "calendarWeekViewFragment.onItemClick" function is called
onBindViewHolder(CompletedTasksAdapter.CompletedTasksViewHolder, int) - Method in class com.example.noteation.adapters.CompletedTasksAdapter
Initializes one cell from the RecyclerView, checks if the task given is a time task or a location task it also sets an "OnClickListener" and checks it's a time task then "completedTasksFragment.onTaskClicked" function is called with "isTaskTime" = true, it it's not a time task it's set as false
onBindViewHolder(NotesAdapter.NoteViewHolder, int) - Method in class com.example.noteation.adapters.NotesAdapter
bind the data to the view holder, takes a note from the notesList (in a specific position that is received by the name of "position") and ties it to the NoteViewHolder by setting the attributes of the note item view it also sets an "OnClickListener", when clicked it calls "notesFragment.onNoteClicked"
onBindViewHolder(TasksAdapter.TasksViewHolder, int) - Method in class com.example.noteation.adapters.TasksAdapter
Initializes one cell from the RecyclerView, checks if the task given is a time task or a location task it also sets an "OnClickListener" and checks it's a time task then "tasksFragment.onTaskClicked" function is called with "isTaskTime" = true, it it's not a time task it's set as false
onBindViewHolder(TasksCalendarAdapter.TasksCalendarViewHolder, int) - Method in class com.example.noteation.adapters.TasksCalendarAdapter
Initializes one cell from the RecyclerView, checks if the task given is a time task (even though it should be always a time task) it also sets an "OnClickListener", when clicked it calls "tasksFragment.onTaskClicked"
onCompletedTaskClicked(Task, int, boolean) - Method in class com.example.noteation.fragments.CompletedTasksFragment
When a task is clicked, it sends the user to view the completed task
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.noteation.activities.LocationTaskEditActivity
 
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.noteation.activities.MainActivity
The "MainActivity" of the app is in charge of all the fragments inside the drawer navigation view and controls them with a navigation controller
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.noteation.activities.MapActivity
The "MapActivity" is in charge of allowing the user to add a location to their task, the "onCreate" method is in charge of initializing the map, the places in the search bar and on all the "onClickListeners".

onItemClick(int, LocalDate) - Method in class com.example.noteation.fragments.CalendarFragment

onItemClick(int, LocalDate) - Method in class com.example.noteation.fragments.CalendarWeekViewFragment

onMapReady(GoogleMap) - Method in class com.example.noteation.activities.MapActivity
Initializes the map (it cannot be initialized directly, only threw this method) and sets the map at our current location if possible, if not it shows a toast of the exception
onMapReady(GoogleMap) - Method in class com.example.noteation.fragments.MapFragment
Initializes the map (it cannot be initialized directly, only threw this method) and sets the map at our current location if possible, if not it shows a toast of the exception
onNoteClicked(Note, int) - Method in class com.example.noteation.fragments.NotesFragment
When a note is clicked, it sends the user to view the note
onReceive(Context, Intent) - Method in class com.example.noteation.broadcastRecievers.GeofenceBroadcastReceiver
When the user enters a geofence, a broadcast is sent and this class receives it, when we receive the broadcast, we send a message using the "sendHighPriorityNotification" function in the "NotificationHelper" class
onReceive(Context, Intent) - Method in class com.example.noteation.broadcastRecievers.ReminderBroadcastReceiver
When the time of the reminder is equal to the current time, a broadcast is sent and this class receives it, when we receive the broadcast, we send a message using the "sendHighPriorityNotification" function in the "NotificationHelper" class
